LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SettingsDescription: Strips everything by default. If you want less mess on the floor, you can set a maximum drop limit.
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SettingsDescriptionTwo: Apparel over the limit will remain on the corpse, or auto-magically destroyed if the setting is toggled.
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_StripAfterHaul: Strip After Haul (Instead of before haul)
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_AutoDestroy: Auto-Magically Destroy Unstripped Apparel (If unticked, unstripped apparel remains on the corpse like vanilla)
LanguageData.AutoStripOnHaul_SettingsDescriptionThree: Note: At settings lower than "All", tainted apparel over the specified amount will be auto-magically destroyed upon haul!
